title: Addition
content: Calculates the sum of two or more numbers. Formula: `a + b`

title: Subtraction
content: Finds the difference between two numbers. Formula: `a - b`

title: Multiplication
content: Calculates the product of two or more numbers. Formula: `a * b`

title: Division
content: Calculates how many times one number is contained within another. Formula: `a / b`

title: Power (Exponentiation)
content: Raises a number (the base) to the power of another number (the exponent). Formula: `base ^ exponent`

title: Square Root
content: Finds a number that, when multiplied by itself, equals the original number. Formula: `\sqrt{x}`

title: Logarithm
content: The exponent to which a base must be raised to produce a given number. Formula: `log_b(x)`

title: Factorial
content: The product of all positive integers up to a given number. Formula: `n! = n * (n-1) * ... * 1`

title: Greatest Common Divisor (GCD)
content: The largest positive integer that divides two or more integers without leaving a remainder.

title: Least Common Multiple (LCM)
content: The smallest positive integer that is a multiple of two or more integers.

title: Maximum
content: Finds the largest value in a set of numbers.

title: Minimum
content: Finds the smallest value in a set of numbers.

title: Remainder (Modulo)
content: The integer left over after dividing one integer by another. Formula: `a mod n`

title: Negation
content: Changes the sign of a number. Formula: `-x`

title: Multiplicative Inverse
content: The reciprocal of a number. Formula: `1/x`

title: Rounding
content: Alters a number to its nearest integer or specified decimal place.

title: Floor
content: Rounds a number down to the nearest integer.

title: Sine (sin)
content: In a right-angled triangle, the ratio of the length of the opposite side to the length of the hypotenuse. Formula: `sin(θ) = Opposite / Hypotenuse`

title: Cosine (cos)
content: In a right-angled triangle, the ratio of the length of the adjacent side to the length of the hypotenuse. Formula: `cos(θ) = Adjacent / Hypotenuse`

title: Tangent (tan)
content: In a right-angled triangle, the ratio of the length of the opposite side to the length of the adjacent side. Formula: `tan(θ) = Opposite / Adjacent`

title: Radians to Degrees Conversion
content: Converts an angle from radians to degrees. Formula: `degrees = radians * (180 / \pi)`

title: Degrees to Radians Conversion
content: Converts an angle from degrees to radians. Formula: `radians = degrees * (\pi / 180)`

title: Sum of Consecutive Numbers
content: Calculates the sum of the first 'n' positive integers. Formula: `Sum = n * (n + 1) / 2`

title: Area of a Circle
content: The space enclosed by a circle. Formula: `Area = \pi * r^2`

title: Circumference of a Circle
content: The distance around a circle. Formula: `C = 2 * \pi * r` or `C = \pi * d`

title: Length of a Circular Arc
content: The length of a portion of the circumference. Formula: `Arc Length = (θ / 360) * 2 * \pi * r` (where θ is in degrees)

title: Perimeter of a Semi-circle
content: The distance around a semi-circle, including the diameter. Formula: `Perimeter = (\pi * r) + 2r`

title: Area of a Circle Sector
content: The area of a 'slice' of a circle. Formula: `Area = (θ / 360) * \pi * r^2` (where θ is in degrees)

title: Perimeter of a Rectangle
content: The total distance around a rectangle. Formula: `P = 2 * (length + width)`

title: Area of a Rectangle
content: The space enclosed by a rectangle. Formula: `Area = length * width`

title: Perimeter of a Square
content: The total distance around a square. Formula: `P = 4 * side`

title: Area of a Square
content: The space enclosed by a square. Formula: `Area = side^2`

title: Area of a Trapezium
content: Formula: `Area = 0.5 * (a + b) * h` (where a and b are the parallel sides and h is the height)

title: Perimeter of a Rhombus
content: Formula: `P = 4 * side`

title: Area of a Rhombus
content: Formula: `Area = 0.5 * d1 * d2` (where d1 and d2 are the diagonals)

title: Area of a General Quadrilateral
content: For irregular quadrilaterals, often found by dividing it into two triangles.

title: Volume of a Cone
content: Formula: `V = (1/3) * \pi * r^2 * h`

title: Volume of a Rectangular Prism
content: Formula: `V = length * width * height`

title: Volume of a Cube
content: Formula: `V = side^3`

title: Volume of a Sphere
content: Formula: `V = (4/3) * \pi * r^3`

title: Volume of a Cylinder
content: Formula: `V = \pi * r^2 * h`

title: Surface Area of a Cone
content: Total Surface Area Formula: `A = \pi*r*(r + \sqrt{h^2 + r^2})`

title: Surface Area of a Cylinder
content: Total Surface Area Formula: `A = 2*\pi*r*h + 2*\pi*r^2`

title: Surface Area of a Cube
content: Formula: `A = 6 * side^2`

title: Surface Area of a Rectangular Prism
content: Formula: `A = 2 * (lw + lh + wh)`

title: Surface Area of a Sphere
content: Formula: `A = 4 * \pi * r^2`

title: Probability of Union of Events
content: The probability of either of two events occurring. Formula: `P(A U B) = P(A) + P(B) - P(A \cap B)`

title: Probability of Complement Event
content: The probability of an event not occurring. Formula: `P(not A) = 1 - P(A)`

title: Combinations
content: The number of ways to choose 'r' items from a set of 'n' items where order does not matter. Formula: `nCr = n! / (r! * (n-r)!)`

title: Permutations
content: The number of ways to arrange 'r' items from a set of 'n' items where order matters. Formula: `nPr = n! / (n-r)!`

title: Percentage Calculation
content: Finds a part of a whole in terms of 100. Formula: `Percent = (Part / Whole) * 100`

title: Price after Gain
content: Calculates the final price after a percentage gain. Formula: `Final Price = Original Price * (1 + Gain\% / 100)`

title: Price after Loss
content: Calculates the final price after a percentage loss. Formula: `Final Price = Original Price * (1 - Loss\% / 100)`

title: Gain Percent
content: Calculates the percentage profit relative to the cost. Formula: `Gain\% = ((Selling Price - Cost Price) / Cost Price) * 100`

title: Loss Percent
content: Calculates the percentage loss relative to the cost. Formula: `Loss\% = ((Cost Price - Selling Price) / Cost Price) * 100`

title: Original Price before Gain
content: Calculates the original price before a percentage gain was applied. Formula: `Original Price = Final Price / (1 + Gain\% / 100)`

title: Original Price before Loss
content: Calculates the original price before a percentage loss was applied. Formula: `Original Price = Final Price / (1 - Loss\% / 100)`

title: Speed
content: Rate of change of position. Formula: `Speed = Distance / Time`

title: Combined Work Rate
content: The combined rate when multiple entities work together. Formula: `1/T_total = 1/T1 + 1/T2`

title: Relative Speed (Boat and Stream)
content: Downstream Speed = `Speed_boat + Speed_stream`. Upstream Speed = `Speed_boat - Speed_stream`.

title: Speed in Still Water
content: Calculates a boat's speed without the effect of a current. Formula: `Speed_boat = (Downstream Speed + Upstream Speed) / 2`

title: Stream Speed
content: Calculates the speed of the current. Formula: `Speed_stream = (Downstream Speed - Upstream Speed) / 2`
